    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int portNum)
        The user can name any port for the server.
        Parameters:
        the - port number for the server

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        public void startServer()
        Function to completely setup server communications. A new server socket is created and then it waits for a client. After that input output streams are created(setUpInputOutput()), after that the function to check for incoming messages is called(checkForIncomingMessages()) endConnection() will close connect, input and output.

      • run

        public void run()
        This thread will run and continuously check for messages typed by the server. sendMessage(String theMessage) will format the server message. This thread is started at the beginning of checkForIncomingMessages(). (non-Javadoc)
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
        See Also:
        Thread.run()

      • checkForIncomingMessages

        public void checkForIncomingMessages()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        starts thread to check for messages typed by server. Message contains input from the client connected to server If client types quit, thread is stopped and connections will be closed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IF connection is lost server is logged out

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.math.BigInteger theMessage)
        The message typed by the server is formatted and sent to the client that is connected to the server.
        Parameters:
        The - message that the server just typed.

      • setUpInputOutput

        public boolean setUpInputOutput()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Streams are created when the server connects to the client program
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error setting up streams

      • endConnection

        public void endConnection()
        Close all connections to client. Then exit the program

      • formatServerInfo

        public void formatServerInfo()
        Formats all the information gathered by the ArrayList serverInformation(String)

      • saveConversationToFile

        public void saveConversationToFile()
        All Server information is saved to a file following the end of the conversation

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        A getter method for port number of server
        Returns:
        the current port number

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        sets a new port number for the server
        Parameters:
        port - new port number for server
